defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item:
Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives
Martin P. Catherwood Library
227 Ives Hall
Cornell University
Ithaca, NY 14853
(607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu
http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

titlepage.date: Â© 2016 Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.p: Melvyn Dubofsky is the Bartle Distinguished Professor of History and Sociology at the State University of New York at Binghamton.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Melvyn Dubofsky Papers #6218. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p:
Related Collections:
